results.name: Decimal representation of the x-axis, from the left edge to the origin, (and also from the origin to the right edge) of the n-th stage of growth of the two-dimensional cellular automaton defined by "Rule 209", based on the 5-celled von Neumann neighborhood.
comment: Initialized with a single black (ON) cell at stage zero.
The nonzero bisection appears to be A083420. - _Tom Copeland_, Dec 27 2016
